admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
trustfund: TF039334-CHINA - GUANGXI HIGHWAY PROJECT,TF037398-CHINA - GUANGXI PROV. HWY

abstracts.cdata!:
The Guangxi Highway Project in China,
            will provide cost-effective inter-provincial transport links
            among land-locked provinces, and stimulate economic
            development, reduce poverty, and thus reduce regional
            disparities. The components include: 1) expansion of the
            highway capacity, through partial construction of the
            National Trunk Highway System, connecting the Shuiren, and
            Nanning provinces, as well as those roads connecting into
            the corridor; 2) maintenance and rehabilitation of the
            highway system is included, particularly for those rural
            roads, in relatively poor areas; 3) highway safety will be
            improved, through the upgrade of the most dangerous road
            sections in sub-urban areas of the Nanning, and Wuming
            provinces, and other selected road segments; and, 4) the
            Guangxi Communications Department's capacity will be
            strengthened, through support, and training on project
            planning, design, construction, and supervision. Further
            support is included for project management, and monitoring
            of environmental, and resettlement plans.
